name: Brella
description:
It's a rainy, windy day in the city. Luckily, you've got your faithful little umbrella to keep you dry!

Angle your umbrella against the direction of the wind, and watch out for other pedestrians on the sidewalk. If you walk over an air vent, it will dry you off a little bit, but don't depend on that to keep yourself from getting soaked!

Controls:
A / D - Move left/right
Arrows - Tilt umbrella
